page.title: 03A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JULIAN
page.content:
{
We came in and it was time to have our football house matches between Saturn,Mercury,Jupiter and my team Neptune.My house team Neptune,won. I then went home and had my tea and went out to play football with my friends.A lot of my friends were playing.We carried on playing football.Then we played cricket,I got two people out,but my team lost.My mam had taken my sister to Brownies as there was a Brownie coffee evening.I then came in and got ready for bed and watched my television.Then I turned my television off at about 9.30pm and went to bed.
